amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt all Native American sacred and cultural sites from the land conveyance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 112-258 to exempt all Native American sacred and cultural sites from the land conveyance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 233 (Roll no. 805).
